{{Wireless embedded system |brand=BandLuxe |model=R305 |revision= |upc= |ean=4712818270211 |asin=B004CR8WNE |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/16/2009 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=UZI-R305 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3050 |cpu1_cspeed=320 MHz |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=4 MiB |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 MiB |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (USB only) |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3050 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=HSPA+ |stock_boot=U-Boot;3.2;Ralink; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.21; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=HSPA_ROUTER |default_ssid_regex=^HSPA_ROUTER$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=hsparouter |oui=00:26:82 |oui_eth=00:26:82 }} '''HSPA+ WiFi Router'''
[http://www.bandrich.com/R305_over.html Product page]
[http://www.bandrich.com/R305-Spec.html Specifications] OEM Gemtek (WRTR-251G?) :"ENG-X11-5800" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The main board of this device is the same used by the [[BandLuxe R250]]. The FCC test report also notes that the ID is applicable to the R250. It states the differences between the units as the following... *R305 - downlink to 21Mbps *R250 - downlink to 14.4Mbps Additional specifications, per '''BandRich''''s page, follow... *Dimensions (LxWxH): [[Dimensions::103.2 mm x 116 mm x 24 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::170 g]] *Modem: Embedded, WCDMA/HSPA/HSPA+ ==Serial== ===Pinout=== ===Info derived from=== {{SCollapse|boot log |
